Package org.neo4j.configuration

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    BufferingLog.LogMessage  
    SettingChangeListener<V>
    A listener for value updates of a specific Setting in a specific Config
    SettingMigrator
    Implementations are responsible for migrating deprecated Settings.
    SettingObserver<T>
    An object tied to a specific Config, Setting pair, providing quick access to the value
    SettingsDeclaration
    Interface to allow service loading of Setting instances.
    SettingValueParser<T>
    Handling the values associated with a Setting object
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BufferingLog
    Buffers all messages sent to it, and is able to replay those messages into another Logger.
    Config  
    Config.Builder  
    ConfigUtils  
    ExternalSettings  
    FulltextSettings  
    GraphDatabaseInternalSettings  
    GraphDatabaseSettings  
    GroupSetting
    A group of settings that can represented in multiple instances.
    SettingConstraint<T>
    A constraint limiting the set of accepted values of the associated Setting

  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    Description
    Used to add description of settings.
    DocumentedDefaultValue
    Used to override the default value which is printed in the documentation.

    Used to define a configuration setting as internal.
